metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12954 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The gig::Region::GetSampleFromWavePool function in gig.cpp in libgig 4.0.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory read and application crash) via a crafted gig file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12954` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gigtools - 4.1.0~repack-2
libakai0 - 4.1.0~repack-2
libgig9 - 4.1.0~repack-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgig package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.0~repack-2').
